settings.pingwheel.player_info_mode.hold: Player Info is shown when the "%s" (%s) Key Bind is held
command.pingwheel.player_tracking.get.de: check if player tracking is currently enabled
command.pingwheel.player_tracking.set.de: enable or disable the tracking of players
command.pingwheel.regen_time.get.descrip: get the current time to regenerate ping usages
command.pingwheel.regen_time.set.descrip: set the time to regenerate ping usages
command.pingwheel.rate_limit.get.descrip: get the current rate limit for ping usages
command.pingwheel.rate_limit.set.descrip: set the rate limit for ping usages
